name: CIS_EKS_v1.1.0 - 3.2.1
title: Ensure that the --anonymous-auth argument is set to false
script:
function parse_yaml {
   local prefix=$2
   local s='[[:space:]]*' w='[a-zA-Z0-9_]*' fs=$(echo @|tr @ '\034')
   sed -ne "s|^\($s\):|\1|" \
        -e "s|^\($s\)\($w\)$s:$s[\"']\(.*\)[\"']$s\$|\1$fs\2$fs\3|p" \
        -e "s|^\($s\)\($w\)$s:$s\(.*\)$s\$|\1$fs\2$fs\3|p"  $1 |
   awk -F$fs '{
      indent = length($1)/2;
      vname[indent] = $2;
      for (i in vname) {if (i > indent) {delete vname[i]}}
      if (length($3) > 0) {
         vn=""; for (i=0; i<indent; i++) {vn=(vn)(vname[i])("_")}
         printf("%s%s%s=%s\n", "'$prefix'",vn, $2, $3);
      }
   }'
}

file_path=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-config=[^ ]*' | cut -d= -f2)
if [ -z $file_path ]; then
  file_path=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-config [^ ]*' | cut -d' ' -f2)
  if [ -z $file_path ]; then
    echo "File Not Found"
    exit 1
  fi
fi

if [ -f $file_path ]; then
  if [[ $file_path == *"yaml"* ]]; then
    data=$(parse_yaml $file_path)
    auth_anonymous=$(grep "^authentication_anonymous_enabled=" <<< "$data" | cut -d= -f2-)
  elif [[ $file_path == *"json"* ]]; then
    auth_anonymous=$(jq '.authentication.anonymous.enabled' $file_path)
  fi
  if [ $auth_anonymous == "false" ]; then
    exit 0
  else
    echo "EKS CIS 3.2.1 - Ensure that the authentication.anonymous.enabled is set to false."
    exit 1
  fi
fi
